name: final-shop
description: To create development environment: - Run npm install in final-shop folder; - Run npm install in client folder; - Run npm install in backend folder;

scripts.pre-deploy: concurrently "cd backend && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && nodemon server.js" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION===false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
